project: Athlete Talk is an application that aims to empower athletes by providing energizing behavioral health content as well as a space to process and discuss what they learn together.

headline: A brand talking for itself. Is the best experience.
description: AthleteTalk is an application that aims to empower athletes by providing energizing behavioral health content as well as a space to process and discuss what they learn together. AthleteTalk includes text and picture-based multi-day plans that include questions intended to help athletes critically and intentionally think through their wellness enhancement efforts. AthleteTalk also includes wellness videos from some of the premier sports behavioral health specialists in some truly unique areas such as trauma, mindfulness, and diaphragmatic breathing. When it comes to behavioral health and wellness - this is where AthletesTalk.
improvementText: This project was challenge on many fronts and it taught lessons that will follow in my career.

project: The Royal Guard represents my passion for menswear education and nearly a decade of wardrobe consulting. TRG is a membership based style agency that caters to professional men and androgynous women.

headline: A brand talking for itself. The best experience.
description: Education is the focal point of this platform. I provide 4 memberships each that speak to a democratic of clients i've worked with in the past. TRG is currently in production and expected to launch fall of 2021.
improvementText: This project is every growing and will continue to change as time passes. These stats are provided by Google's Firebase suite.

project: Style by JM - Footwear is a Texas based leather goods compnay. The brands primary product is footwear but also offers a large range of Spanish made leather goods. This is a full-stack e-commerce web appllication.

headline: A brand talking for itself. Is the best experience.
description: Designed in San Antonio, Texas and handmade in Almansa, Spain.

SBJM Footwear is the first of three online applications created by it's mother company, SALA Investment Co. to cater to those who appreciate quality product built using old world techniques and practices.
improvementText: This application is due to launch late summer of 2021. Check back daily for updates.

project: I worked directly with the Los Angeles based branding firm, LayerCake, Inc. Myself and creative director Horace Wormley curated the first phase for the Runnit.Live application.

headline: A brand talking for itself. Is the best experience.
description: Runnit.Live was created to capture customer information and provide a live stream service to extended friends and family of the athletes us workout or play at The DSTRKT, a training facility in Chatsworth, California.
improvementText: LayerCake, Inc. has long-term plans to expand the Runnit.Live progressive web app as-well-as adding a mobile application in the near future. Here are just a few stats from the project.
